backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, question management, full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests, test attempts with section-based timing, leaderboard functionality, and admin registration with access control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of the 'Admin Setup' navigation link from Navbar.tsx while preserving direct URL access to the admin registration route '/admin/register'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities, with detailed descriptions of functionality, role-based access control, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Concept Delta navy blue theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description, and title for the Concept Delta MHT-CET mock test platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query client, TanStack Router, theme provider, and toast notifications with strict mode enabled.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links, YouTube channel link, social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, authentication controls, role-based admin links, responsive mobile menu, dual admin verification (useGetCallerUserRole and useIsCallerAdmin), and extensive diagnostic logging for role verification (Admin Setup link removed).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatic query invalidation on identity changes, and admin token initialization from URL parameters.
Provides a mutation hook for registering admin users with retry logic, exponential backoff, and comprehensive error handling for actor connection issues and principal validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Exports mutation hooks for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, with query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides mutation hooks for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, and identity management using AuthClient with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, and user roles with detailed logging for role queries.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with pre-flight admin verification, detailed error logging, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutation hooks for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, validation for test parameters (name, marks, duration), and automatic navigation back to admin dashboard after successful creation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Main admin dashboard with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management; displays full syllabus and chapter-wise tests with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing question selection per section and validating that each section has at least one question.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating questions with text/image support for both questions and options, including subject, class level, correct answer selection, and explanation fields with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistration.tsx: Admin registration page accessible via direct URL that allows registering admin users by principal ID, with special handling for first admin registration and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner, features, YouTube subscription prompt, Telegram community link, and a call-to-action button that either logs in or navigates to dashboard based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test performers with rank, score, time taken, and medal icons for top 3 positions; requires authentication and fetches leaderboard data for a specific test ID.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Shows detailed test results including score, time taken, question-by-question breakdown with correct/incorrect answers, and provides PDF export functionality for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Main student dashboard displaying available full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests organized by class and subject, with functionality to start tests and view test history.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Interactive test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection via radio buttons, section transitions, and auto-submit functionality when time expires.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, mapping paths to components for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates PDF reports for test results, calculating scores, statistics (correct/incorrect/unanswered), and formatting HTML content with test details, user profile, and performance metrics for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, documenting architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), known issues (admin access problems, navigation link visibility), and existing features including branding changes and hero image updates.
